titles.title: Electing a named Member to standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/28/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on January 28, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates independent membership on the House Committees on Financial Services and Government Reform.
